content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from the AI suggesting to use Selenium WebDriver to automate interactions with the game's web interface, which I added to "league_of_legends_bot_web_interface.txt" using the "write_to_file" command. The AI also previously suggested using TensorFlow for machine learning and OpenCV and PyAutoGUI for game screen analysis and control, respectively. In addition, the AI suggested using the Riot Games API to retrieve information about the game state and control the game, but when I attempted to add this information to "league_of_legends_bot_riot_games_api.txt" using the "write_to_file" command, I received an error message indicating that the file had already been updated.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_web_interface.txt", "text": "We can use Selenium WebDriver to automate interactions with the game\'s web interface."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_riot_games_api.txt", "text": "We can use the Riot Games API to retrieve information about the game state and control the game."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: Error: File has already been updated.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_pygame.txt", "text": "We can use the Pygame library to create a bot that can play the game by simulating mouse and keyboard inputs."}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
